description: Header file declaring functions and macros for converting legacy iControl rules, constraints, actions, and schedules into Sheens-based JavaScript representations within a JSON structure. It also includes licensing info and macro definitions.

methods.name: sheens_trigger2javascript
methods.description: Converts a legacy iControl trigger into a Sheens state machine node represented as a JSON pattern.

methods.name: sheens_negative2javascript
methods.description: Converts legacy negative triggers into Sheens JSON patterns, possibly generating additional state nodes.

methods.name: sheens_constraints2javascript
methods.description: Recursively converts legacy constraints into Sheens JavaScript code, filling the provided buffer.

methods.name: sheens_actions2javascript
methods.description: Converts legacy iControl actions into Sheens JSON patterns, potentially generating multiple state nodes.

methods.name: sheens_schedules2javascript
methods.description: Converts legacy thermostat schedules to Sheens-based JavaScript JSON patterns.
